footer.aboutus: We seek to open doors for your future and show that, with the right information, everyone can go much further than they think. Even because the world will always need authentic people motivated by their own dreams

home.mainp1: futop is a project developed for the
home.mainp2: with the aim of promoting accessibility to high-quality information for young people. We want to raise the level of education and promote social equality through opportunities that interest you, focusing on the ideal of aptitude in your own area of ​​knowledge and studying by will instead of obligation.
home.motivationsDescription: “Opportunities multiply as they are seized” - Sun Tzu
home.motivationsbox1description: We seek to use technological means to promote access to reliable and high-quality information
home.motivationsbox2description: We look forward to help young people achieve their academic dreams
home.motivationsbox3description: We believe that the different forms of intelligence are equally divided in all social strata
home.requirementstitle: What do you need to participate
home.joinustitle: Want to know more about it?
home.joinusdescription1: “It is education that makes the future look like a place of hope and transformation”

suggestions.suggestionp1: Would you like to help us build an increasingly dynamic space adapted to your needs to build a better future?
suggestions.suggestionp2: Fill in a form with your suggestions and help us improve.
suggestions.idea1title: To make the world more equal
suggestions.ideiap: Ever since the beginning, we had a well-defined goal: to remedy social inequality using technological means. The main motivation for choosing this focus area was noticing the difference between the academic knowledge of students who never had access to academic opportunities and those who did. While those who didn't have access to information only dreamed about the possibility of entering a university, those who had couldn't even imagine not being at a university after high school.
suggestions.sugestionaboutus: We seek to open doors for your future and show that, with the right information, everyone can go much further than they think. Even because the world will always need authentic people motivated by their own dreams.
suggestions.suggestiondescription1: We know that inequality is a problem directly related to social inequality. Therefore, we will try our best to overcome this problem through academic opportunities
suggestions.suggestiondescription2: We aim to instigate the constant search for knowledge and develop the student's vision in relation to the academic environment.
suggestions.suggestiondescription3: We believe that the different forms of intelligence are equally divided in all social strata
